| HistoryText             = The Wraithknights were created by a version of the [[Dire Wraiths]] by torturing and corrupting [[Galadorians]] and merging them with armor equivalent to a [[Spaceknights (Galadorian) (Earth-616)|Spaceknight]]. They appeared to have roughly equivalent abilities, technology, and weaponry. The Wraithknights were led by a Supreme Wraithknight who was larger and more powerful than the rest.

This Supreme Wraithknight was slain in single combat by the Spaceknight [[Val (Earth-616)|Val (Sentry)]].{{r|Spaceknights Vol 1 1|5}}

| Weapons                 = The Supreme Wraithknight had the ability to summon and control a [[Deathwing]].
